forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h, becoming E and decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph, becoming E and decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
